Control Name: 5.1.6 Ensure the storage account containing the container with activity logs is encrypted with BYOK (Use Your Own Key) (Scored)
Control Statement: Configuring the storage account with the activity log export container to use BYOK (Use Your Own Key) provides additional confidentiality controls on log data as a given user must have read permission on the corresponding storage account and must be granted decrypt permission by the CMK
